mapper.select: SELECT a.id courseId, a.cover, a.title courseName, a.lesson_num lessonNum, a.price, b.NAME teacherName, c.title parentSubjectName, d.title childSubjectName FROM edu_course a LEFT JOIN edu_teacher b ON a.teacher_id = b.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject c ON a.parent_subject_id = c.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject d ON a.child_subject_id = d.id WHERE a.id=#{courseId}
